channel.title: Not Even The Cleverest Human Could Solve This..!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape! :) I've Got Two Questions Today For 614 Source.
1) How can I change the commands so every-one could use them [ at the moment only admins can :/ ]
2) How to change character back to a Male because theres a command called female and I tryed it and it worked so then I tryed to switch back to a male but it wouldnt let me
Picture on commands not working for normal players :
[img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/3916/commandsnotworking.png[/img]

item.title: Not Even The Cleverest Human Could Solve This..!
item.dc:creator: @harnum1 harnum1
item.description:
@harnum1 wrote:

To make a player mod/admin on a 614 go into “Frames.java” and click CTRL+F and type in admin

you should see something like this:

public void loginResponce() {
String[] admins = {"____", "____"};//admins go here
for(String admin : admins) {
if(player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(admin)) {
player.setRights((byte) 2);
}
}
String[] mods = {"____", "____"};//mods go here
for(String mod : mods) {
if(player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(mod)) {
player.setRights((byte) 1);
}

put the names of the mod’s/admin’s where i put “___”

Hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: Not Even The Cleverest Human Could Solve This..!

item.title: Not Even The Cleverest Human Could Solve This..!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

[quote=“mages pk god, post:8, topic:373402”][quote author=F A I L S link=topic=469415.msg3431937#msg3431937 date=1292433785]

  1. Go to the client.java in your source search for that command and you should see like >=2 (2 = admin) change that 2 to 0 (normal Players) and that should work

  2. Type ::char (it should work)

-facepalm-
that’s for 317 version dude we are talking 614 here… :L
anyway, it would help to know the layout of ur files? are they organised into packeted data? because most admin commands on servers like that are registered strictly to a specific username.
[/quote]last time i checked it worked on both

nah bro client.java doesn’t even exist on 508+ servers[/quote]shit… hahah i fail

Read full topic
